info.title: deAPI REST API
info.description: Decentralized AI inference API for image generation, video processing, audio transcription, and more.

post.description: Endpoint for requesting audio transcription

audio.description: Audio file to transcribe. Supported formats: AAC, MP3, OGG, WAV, WebM, FLAC. Maximum file size: 10 MB.

model.description: The model to use for generation

return_result_in_response.description: If true, the result will be returned directly in the response instead of only download url. Optional parameter.

webhook_url.description: Optional HTTPS URL to receive webhook notifications for job status changes (processing, completed, failed). Must be HTTPS. Max 2048 characters. See [Webhook Documentation](/execution-modes-and-integrations/webhooks) for payload structure and authentication details.

post.description: Endpoint for requesting audio transcription price

audio.description: Audio file to transcribe. Supported formats: AAC, MP3, OGG, WAV, WebM, FLAC. Maximum file size: 10 MB.

model.description: The model to use for generation

duration_seconds.description: Duration of audio in seconds for price calculation

model.description: The model to use for generation

post.description: Endpoint for requesting audio transcription (Twitter Spaces)

audio_url.description: URL of Twitter Spaces audio to transcribe

model.description: The model to use for transcription. Available models can be retrieved via the GET /api/v1/client/models endpoint.

return_result_in_response.description: If true, the result will be returned directly in the response instead of only download url. Optional parameter.

webhook_url.description: Optional HTTPS URL to receive webhook notifications for job status changes (processing, completed, failed). Must be HTTPS. Max 2048 characters. See [Webhook Documentation](/execution-modes-and-integrations/webhooks) for payload structure and authentication details.

post.description: Endpoint for calculating price for audio to text inference (Twitter Spaces)

audio_url.description: URL of Twitter Spaces audio to transcribe (required if duration_seconds not provided)

duration_seconds.description: Duration in seconds (required if audio_url not provided)

model.description: The model to use for transcription. Available models can be retrieved via the GET /api/v1/client/models endpoint.

200.description: Calculated price for audio to text inference.

get.description: Endpoint for requesting client current balance.

post.description: Endpoint for requesting ima2img inference

prompt.description: The main prompt for image generation

negative_prompt.description: Elements to avoid in the generated image

image.description: Source image to edit. Supported formats: JPG, JPEG, PNG, GIF, BMP, WebP. Maximum file size: 10 MB.

model.description: The model to use for image editing. Available models can be retrieved via the GET /api/v1/client/models endpoint.

loras.description: Array of LoRA models to apply

weight.description: Weight of the LoRA model (must be non-negative)

webhook_url.description: Optional HTTPS URL to receive webhook notifications for job status changes (processing, completed, failed). Must be HTTPS. Max 2048 characters. See [Webhook Documentation](/execution-modes-and-integrations/webhooks) for payload structure and authentication details.

prompt.description: The main prompt for image generation

negative_prompt.description: Elements to avoid in the generated image

model.description: The model to use for generation

loras.description: Array of LoRA models to apply

weight.description: Weight of the LoRA model (must be non-negative)

post.description: Endpoint for requesting image2text (OCR) inference

image.description: Image file to extract text from. Supported formats: JPG, JPEG, PNG, GIF, BMP, WebP. Maximum file size: 10 MB.

model.description: The OCR model to use for text extraction

return_result_in_response.description: If true, the result will be returned directly in the response instead of only download url. Optional parameter.

webhook_url.description: Optional HTTPS URL to receive webhook notifications for job status changes (processing, completed, failed). Must be HTTPS. Max 2048 characters. See [Webhook Documentation](/execution-modes-and-integrations/webhooks) for payload structure and authentication details.

post.description: Endpoint for calculating price for image2text (OCR) inference

image.description: Image file to extract text from. Supported formats: JPG, JPEG, PNG, GIF, BMP, WebP. Maximum file size: 10 MB.

model.description: The OCR model to use for text extraction. Available models can be retrieved via the GET /api/v1/client/models endpoint.

width.description: Width of image in pixels for price calculation

height.description: Height of image in pixels for price calculation

model.description: The OCR model to use for text extraction. Available models can be retrieved via the GET /api/v1/client/models endpoint.

get.description: Get sample prompts for AI inference tasks based on type and optional topic

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: Type of sample prompt to generate

parameters.name: topic
parameters.description: Optional topic to base the prompt on. Uses default topics if not provided.

parameters.name: lang_code
parameters.description: Optional language code for text-to-speech prompts

prompt.example: A futuristic cyberpunk cityscape at night, neon lights reflecting off wet streets, towering holographic advertisements, flying cars weaving between glass skyscrapers, cinematic composition, moody, atmospheric, ultra-detailed digital art style.

422.description: Validation failed - invalid type or topic too long

post.description: Endpoint for requesting text2audio inference

text.description: Text to be converted to speech

model.description: The model to use for speech generation. Available models can be retrieved via the GET /api/v1/client/models endpoint.

voice.description: Name of the voice to be used during audio generation

lang.description: Language to be used during audio generation

webhook_url.description: Optional HTTPS URL to receive webhook notifications for job status changes (processing, completed, failed). Must be HTTPS. Max 2048 characters. See [Webhook Documentation](/execution-modes-and-integrations/webhooks) for payload structure and authentication details.

post.description: Endpoint for calculating price for text2audio inference. Either text or count_text must be provided.

requestBody.description: Audio generation parameters. Either text or count_text must be provided.

text.description: Text to be converted to speech. Either this or count_text must be provided.

count_text.description: Number of characters for price calculation. Either this or text must be provided.

model.description: The model to use for speech generation. Available models can be retrieved via the GET /api/v1/client/models endpoint.

voice.description: Name of the voice to be used during audio generation

lang.description: Language to be used during audio generation

post.description: Endpoint for requesting text to embedding inference

input.description: Input text(s) to generate embeddings for. Can be a single string or array of strings (max 2048 items). Each input limited to 8192 tokens, total request limited to 300k tokens.

oneOf.example: This is a sample text for embedding generation.

model.description: The embedding model to use. Available models can be retrieved via the GET /api/v1/client/models endpoint.

return_result_in_response.description: If true, the embedding result will be returned directly in the response instead of only download url. Optional parameter.

webhook_url.description: Optional HTTPS URL to receive webhook notifications for job status changes (processing, completed, failed). Must be HTTPS. Max 2048 characters. See [Webhook Documentation](/execution-modes-and-integrations/webhooks) for payload structure and authentication details.

post.description: Endpoint for calculating price for text to embedding inference

input.description: Input text(s) to generate embeddings for. Can be a single string or array of strings (max 2048 items). Each input limited to 8192 tokens, total request limited to 300k tokens.

oneOf.example: This is a sample text for embedding generation.

model.description: The embedding model to use. Available models can be retrieved via the GET /api/v1/client/models endpoint.

parameters.name: filter[is_basic]
parameters.description: If true returns all basic models.

WebhookHeaders.title: Webhook Request Headers
WebhookHeaders.description: Headers included in all webhook notification requests. Use these to verify authenticity and process events.

X-DeAPI-Signature.description: HMAC-SHA256 signature for payload verification. Format: sha256=<hex-encoded-hmac>. Calculate as: HMAC-SHA256(key: webhook_secret, message: timestamp + "." + raw_json_payload)

X-DeAPI-Timestamp.description: Unix timestamp when the webhook was sent. Use for replay attack prevention - reject requests older than 5 minutes.

X-DeAPI-Event.description: The type of event that triggered this webhook

X-DeAPI-Delivery-Id.description: Unique identifier for this webhook delivery. Use for idempotency handling.

WebhookProcessingPayload.title: Webhook Payload - Job Processing
WebhookProcessingPayload.description: Payload sent when a job transitions from pending to processing state. Indicates a worker has started processing the job.

timestamp.description: ISO 8601 timestamp when the event occurred

job_request_id.description: The UUID of the job request

WebhookCompletedPayload.title: Webhook Payload - Job Completed
WebhookCompletedPayload.description: Payload sent when a job completes successfully. Includes the result URL for downloading the output.

timestamp.description: ISO 8601 timestamp when the event occurred

job_request_id.description: The UUID of the job request

completed_at.description: ISO 8601 timestamp when the job completed

result_url.description: URL to download the job result

WebhookFailedPayload.title: Webhook Payload - Job Failed
WebhookFailedPayload.description: Payload sent when a job fails during processing. Includes error details for debugging.

timestamp.description: ISO 8601 timestamp when the event occurred

job_request_id.description: The UUID of the job request

failed_at.description: ISO 8601 timestamp when the job failed

error_message.example: Worker failed to respond within the allowed time

model.description: Model name used for generation

file_url.description: URL of audio file to transcribe

inference_types.description: Available inference types for this model with their specific configurations

info.description: Model specifications including limits, features, and defaults. Structure varies by model type.

loras.description: Available LoRA models for this diffusion model. Only present when the model supports LoRA and has LoRA models available.

languages.description: Available languages and voices for this model. Only present for TTS models that support multiple languages.

height.description: Height of the generated video in pixels

frames.description: Number of video frames to generate

status.description: Current status of the job request

result_url.description: URL to the result file (e.g. generate image or audio). Only available when status is done

result.description: Generate text (e.g. transcription) Only available when status is done

progress.description: Current progress of the job (0.0 to 100.0)

model.description: Model name used for generation

ValidationError.description: Validation failed. Common errors include: model does not exist, model does not support the inference type for this endpoint, or invalid request parameters.

message.example: The selected model does not support Text To Image.

model: The selected model does not support Text To Image.

RateLimitExceeded.description: Rate limit exceeded. Check X-RateLimit-Type header to determine if minute (RPM) or daily (RPD) limit was hit.

X-RateLimit-Remaining.description: Remaining requests in current minute window

X-RateLimit-Daily-Remaining.description: Remaining requests in current day window

X-RateLimit-Type.description: Type of rate limit exceeded: "minute" for RPM, "daily" for RPD

Retry-After.description: Seconds until rate limit resets (60 for minute, up to 86400 for daily)

X-RateLimit-Remaining.description: Remaining requests in current minute window

X-RateLimit-Daily-Remaining.description: Remaining requests in current day window

X-RateLimit-Type.description: Type of rate limit exceeded (only in 429 responses)

Retry-After.description: Seconds until rate limit resets (only in 429 responses)
